description_html:
Convenient Power Options!

These handy grommet-mount receptacles provide power at the surface level and mount easily into all types of furniture. Use on a desk or in the arm of a chair, or anywhere you might need access to convenient charging options. Your choice of Power or Charging USB in Round or Square in 15 color options.

Great for shared work spaces, charging hubs and hospitality environments. Or for providing power options in work stations that are tight on space. With 15 finishes, you can find the perfect fit to blend seamlessly into your design, or make a big splash with a fun, colorful contrast. Drill a 1-3/4" diameter cutout, drop in from the top, hand tighten the locking ring over the threaded cylinder below. Simple! 2" overall diameter.

Colors: Orange, Chartreuse, Slate Green, Blue, Navy Blue, Pimento Red, Black, Grey, White, Dark Bronze/Black, Dark Bronze/White, Satin Nickel/Black, Satin Nickel/White, Polished Chrome/Black and Polished Chrome/White.
